dmca.title: Online Loan Company Requests Takedown of Competitor

KNOXVILLE
MEMPHIS
OTHER OFFICES:

August 11, 2004

VIA FACSIMILE AND CERTIFIED MAIL, RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints 
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Re: Notice of Copyright Infringement and Request for Immediate Takedown 

Ladies and Gentlemen:

This firm represents Loan Alliance, Inc. ("Loan Alliance"), which has authorized us to act on its behalf for this copyright infringement notification. As required under Sections 512(c)(3) and 512(d)(3) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (17 U.S.C.
